Description: 
This application implements three commands to demonstrate the operations of the xrecord.

To run the sample:
Please use Visual Studio 2017 to open the solution called "DotNetSamples.sln"ï¼Œthen build the application.

To use XRecord.dll:
1. Start ZWCAD and open a new drawing.
2. Run NETLOAD command and load the XRecord.dll file in the output directory.
3. Execute the "AddXRecord" command to add the xrecord.
4. Execute the "ModXRecord" command to modify the xrecord.
5. Execute the "DelXRecord" command to delete the xrecord.
